title: WP_Term
description: Core class used to implement the WP_Term object.

parent.description: ID of a term's parent term.

count.description: Cached object count for this term.

cat_ID.description: Term ID. Only present if the term object has passed through `_make_cat_compat()`.

category_count.description: Cached object count for this term. Only present if the term object has passed through `_make_cat_compat()`.

category_description.description: The term's description. Only present if the term object has passed through `_make_cat_compat()`.

cat_name.description: The term's name. Only present if the term object has passed through `_make_cat_compat()`.

category_nicename.description: The term's slug. Only present if the term object has passed through `_make_cat_compat()`.

category_parent.description: ID of a term's parent term. Only present if the term object has passed through `_make_cat_compat()`.

filter.description: Stores the term object's sanitization level.
